title: The Death of Moses
summary: Deuteronomy 34 records Moses’ death. God allows him to see the Promised Land from Mount Nebo but not enter it. Moses dies and is buried by God. Joshua succeeds him, and the people mourn the loss of their great leader.

faq.question: Why didn’t Moses enter the Promised Land?
faq.answer: Because of his disobedience at Meribah when he struck the rock instead of speaking to it.

faq.question: Who took over after Moses?
faq.answer: Joshua, who was filled with the Spirit and had been commissioned by Moses.
